info.title: SuperOffice Agent API v1
info.termsOfService: You must be an authorized user to access this API.

post.summary: Get the chat presence status for all chat users

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Get all chat sessions which this user is a member of.
post.description:
Members means that you have at least one of: Can Respond, Notifications, Listen or Manager

post.summary: Request to send the session to another user.
post.description:

post.summary: Accept the transfer: assign the session to the user.
post.description:

post.summary: Do not want.
post.description:
Deny the transfer to the user. If the session is not being transferred, nothing happens.
NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.

post.summary: 'answer' the session: assign the session to the user.
post.description:
The welcome message is sent to the customer. Returns NULL if session was not in queue.
NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatPresence.description:
Represents presence information for a chat user, bundled with some other useful information
<para />
Carrier object for ChatPresence.
Services for the ChatPresence Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

UserId.description: The id for the chat user

DisplayName.description: The display name of the chat user

OngoingChats.description: The number of ongoing chats this users has now

Present.description: Indicates if the user has the chat presence turned on or off

ChatTopics.description: An array of ids with chat topics that this user is a member of

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.TableRight.description:
Wraps a table right together with an explanatory reason.
Code can indicate why access is restricted.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldProperty.description: Class holding properties like field length, field type about a field in the carrier.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldRight.description:
Wraps the field right together with an explanatory reason.
Also adds logical operators to the field rights so that they can be easily combined.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ChatCarri.description: SaveChatPresence: Save the chat presence for specified users

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatSessionEnti.description:
Chat sessions belong to a chat topic, and contain messages to/from users
<para />
Carrier object for ChatSessionEntity.
Services for the ChatSessionEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

TopicId.description: The reference to the associated chat topic.

Person.description: Customer person in this session - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

CustomerHost.description: The hostname or IP address for the customer.

CustomerName.description: The name of customer, if provided

CustomerEmail.description: The email address of the customer, if provided

CustomerPhone.description: The phone number of the customer, if provided

CustomerConsented.description: The customer consented when starting the session

CustomerCompanyName.description: The name of the customers company, if provided

Status.description: Enum indicating the status for the session (pending, active, closed, etc).

FirstMessage.description: A copy of the first message in the chat session

LastMessage.description: A copy of the last message in the chat session

WhenRequested.description: When the session was requested by the customer.

WhenStarted.description: When the session was accepted by a user.

WhenIdle.description: The last time anyone sent a message for this session.

WhenFetched.description: The last time the customer&apos;s client refetched the data. Used to detect &apos;dead&apos; session.

SessionKey.description: Key used to authenticate the session.

InitialQueuePos.description: The initial queue pos (i.e. the number of pending sessions + 1) when the session was requested.

AlertLevel.description: The alert level for this chat session.

Rank.description: Lowest possible unique number for active sessions for user. User for color index. Starting at 1.

Flags.description: Various flags for the chat session

Contact.description: Contact this session is connected to - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

Project.description: Project the session is connectedto - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

Sale.description: Sale the session is connected to - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

Ticket.description: Ticket the session is connected to - could be empty if we don't know exactly.

TransferTo.description: User agent that has a pending transfer of the chat session

ChatbotIsActive.description: Indicates that a chatbot is active on the session. This will cause bot triggers to fire. Set to 0 when bot hands off to user.

Rating.description: Rating of this chat conversation given by the customer

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.description:
Carrier object for Associate.
Services for the Associate Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IAssociateAgent">Associate Agent</see>.

Name.description: Initials, also login name, possibly database user name

PersonId.description:
Owning person record 
<para>Use MDO List name "person" to get list items.</para>

Type.description: User type - 1 = internal user, 2 = resource, 3 = external user, 4 = anonymous, 5 = system

GroupIdx.description: Primary group membership, see UserGroupLink for secondary memberships

FullName.description: The associate's culture formatted fullname (firstname, middleName and lastname)

FormalName.description: The associate's culture formatted formalname (firstname, middleName and lastname, title, mrmrs)

Deleted.description: If true, the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

EjUserId.description: ID of the ej user record corresponding to this associate; 0 for associates that are not ej users

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.ExtraFields} and <see cref="!:UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Person.description:
Carrier object for Person.
Services for the Person Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPersonAgent">Person Agent</see>.

Position.description: The position. This is a predefined SuperOffice value, different from Title

FullName.description: Get the persons full name (internal name used in clients for employees).

DirectPhone.description: Returns the direct phone that belong to the contact person.

FormalName.description: Get formal name for a person, as used in labels. (Full name + person title + academic title)

Retired.description: 1 = the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

Rank.description: Display sort sequence for default sort order

ActiveInterests.description: Number of records in pintr table; select count(*) from pintr pi where pi.person_id = this.person_id == activeInterests is always true

FaxPhone.description: Returns the fax phone that belong to the contact person.

MobilePhone.description: Returns the mobile phone that belong to the contact person.

ContactPhone.description: Returns the direct phone that belong to the persons contact.

AssociateId.description: Id of the item's owner (Associate id)

UsePersonAddress.description: If 1, use person's address for mailing instead of company address

ContactFax.description: Actual phone number as eneterd by the user

Kanafname.description: Kana first name, used in Japanese versions only

Kanalname.description: Kana last name, used in Japanese versions only

Post1.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post2.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post3.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

ActiveErpLinks.description: How many active ERP links are there for this person?

SupportAssociateId.description: Our support contact for this person

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Contact.description:
Carrier object for Contact.
Services for the Contact Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IContactAgent">Contact Agent</see>.

URL.description: The internet address to this contact

Kananame.description: Contact kana name, used in Japanese versions only

AssociateFullName.description: The associate's culture formatted fullname (firstname, middleName and lastname)

CountryName.description: Name of country in installed language

Address.description: Contact address as  a list of LocalizedFieldList objects. Used to store localized information such as formatted address data. Suitable for passing to an address control for display.

FormattedAddress.description: The contact's address, formatted with linebreaks and spaces into a single string.

IsOwnerContact.description: Is the contact an owner contact.  This means that all persons on this contact can on only be internal users and not external users.

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Address.description:
Street and/or Postal address, in both formatted and structured forms. You only need to modify one of the two for the change to be registered.
<para />
Carrier object for Address.

Wgs84Latitude.description: Latitude (that's north/south), decimal degrees, relative to WGS 84 ellipsoid. SuperOffice ASA is at 59.91892. This value needs no further grid reference or other qualifying information.

Wgs84Longitude.description: Longitude (that's East/west), decimal degrees, relative to WGS 84 ellipsoid. SuperOffice ASA is at 10.73159. This value needs no further grid reference or other qualifying information.

LocalizedAddress.description: LocalizedFieldArray is a list of LocalizedFieldList objects. Used to store localized information such as formatted address data.

Street.description: Street address (company street, person address, delivery address). LocalizedAddress changes override this property, so you do not have to change both Localized and this.

Postal.description: Postal address (company postal, billing address). LocalizedAddress changes override this property, so you do not have to change both Localized and this.

Formatted.description:
Read-only formatted address multi-line string. Combines street and postal into one string. e.g.: <c>"Postboks 123,
Brugata 123,
1234 OSLO
"</c> or <c>"Postbox 123,
Bridgelane 123,
West Tooting,
East Shire ES2 W31
"</c>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.LocalizedField.description:
LocalizedField is used to store localized information such as formatted address data, a formatted phone number, etc.
<para />
Carrier object for LocalizedField.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.StructuredAddre.description:
Address with structured fields (Address1, City, Zip) - does not vary its layout by country, unliked the formatted address.
<para />
Carrier object for StructuredAddress.

AtypeIdx.description: Bit mask, combines address type (EAddressType) and owner type (EOwnerType)

Formatted.description:
Read-only formatted address multi-line string. e.g.: <c>"Brugata 123,
1234 OSLO
"</c> or <c>"Bridgelane 123,
West Tooting,
The Shire ES2 W31
"</c>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Project.description:
Carrier object for Project.
Services for the Project Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IProjectAgent">Project Agent</see>.

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Sale.description:
Carrier object for Sale.
Services for the Sale Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ISaleAgent">Sale Agent</see>.

Probability.description: Actual probability, may differ from the one in the list

Currency.description: Currency the sale was made in.

Status.description: The sale's status, indicating wether the sale is open, sold or lost.

PersonFullName.description: The name of the person this sale belongs to.

Completed.description: The Sale completed state. The completed state is either Started or Completed. NotStarted is treated as Started. The value maps to the Done database field.

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

NextDueDate.description: Next due date, this is a denormalization of 'closest future activity date, or most recent if no future activities'. Maintained by the system, but very convenient for searching.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Ticket.description:
The ticket carrier is used for representing a service request.
<para />
Carrier object for Ticket.
Services for the Ticket Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ITicketAgent">Ticket Agent</see>.

LastChanged.description: The last time the ticket was modified.

ReadByOwner.description: The datetime for when the ticket last was read by the owner.

ReadByCustomer.description: The datetime for when the ticket was read by the customer.

FirstReadByUser.description: The datetime for when the ticket first was read by a user.

Activate.description: When the ticket should be activated, if it is postponed.

RepliedAt.description: The datetime for when the ticket was replied to. I.e. the first external message added to the ticket.

AlertTimeout.description: The datetime for when the ticket should jump to the next alert_level.

CreatedBy.description: The id of the user who created the ticket. 1 (system user) if the ticket was created externally

CreatedByName.description: Initials, also login name, possibly database user name

Author.description: A string representing the author of the ticket (same as author of first message).

OwnedBy.description: The id of the user who owns the ticket. 1 (system user) if the ticket is unassigned.

OwnedByName.description: Initials, also login name, possibly database user name

Category.description: The id of the category a ticket is in.

CategoryName.description: The (short) name of this category. E.g. &apos;support&apos;.

CategoryFullname.description: The fullname (compiled from parents&apos; names) for this category. E.g. &apos;norway/product A/support&apos;.

Priority.description: The reference to the ticket_priority table.

BaseStatus.description: The status of the ticket. I.e. active/closed/postponed/deleted

TicketStatusDisplayValue.description: Get the display name of the ticket status.

Origin.description: What is the origin of this ticket

CustId.description: The reference to the customer. NULL or -1 if ticket is not connected to customer.

PersonFullname.description: Get the full name for the primary person (customer)

AlertLevel.description: The alert level for the ticket. Matches the level value of the ticket_alert table.

ConnectId.description: If a ticket is connected to another ticket, this field is set to the id of the &apos;master&apos; ticket.

ReadStatus.description: Whether the owner has read the ticket or not (red, yellow, green).

TimeToReply.description: The time (minutes) between when the ticket was created and when it was replied to. Calculated based on priority&apos;s timeframe.

RealTimeToReply.description: Same as time_to_reply, but not calculated based on priority.

TimeToClose.description: The time (minutes) between when the ticket was created and when it was closed. Calculated based on priority&apos;s timeframe.

RealTimeToClose.description: Same as time_to_close, but not calculated based on priority.

TimeSpentInternally.description: The total time (seconds) within the priority's office hours the ticket has been in an open status (configurable), not including current state

TimeSpentExternally.description: The total time (seconds) within the priority's office hours the ticket has been in a external waiting status (configurable), not including current state

TimeSpentQueue.description: The total time (seconds) within the priority's office hours the ticket has been in a queue status, not including current state

RealTimeSpentInternally.description: The total time (seconds) within 24x7 the ticket has been in an open status (configurable), not including current state

RealTimeSpentExternally.description: The total time (seconds) within 24x7 the ticket has been in a external waiting status (configurable), not including current state

RealTimeSpentQueue.description: The total time (seconds) within 24x7 hours the ticket has been in a queue status, not including current state

TimeSpent.description: The total time (minutes). Aggregated time spent from ticket&apos;s messages. Read-only for external use.

HasAttachment.description: Boolean indicating if this ticket has one or more attachments.

NumReplies.description: The number of replies (messages) to the customer for this request.

NumMessages.description: The total number of messages for this request.

FromAddress.description: The from-address used when this ticket got created, e.g. by email

ContactId.description: The company of the person in the cust_id field, if that person belongs to a company

ContactName.description: The name of the connected contact

OwnedByAssociateId.description: The associate id of the owner of the ticket.

Language.description: The language of the first external message

Sentiment.description: The sentiment index of the last external message

SentimentConfidence.description: The sentiment confidence of the last external message

SaleHeading.description: The heading of the connected sale

ProjectName.description: The name of the connected project

FormSubmissionId.description: If this ticket was created from a form submission, this field will point to that record

TicketTypeId.description: The id of the Request Type

TicketTypeName.description: The name of the Request Type

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ChatCarri.description: TransferChatSession: Request to send the session to another user. If the session does not belong to the user, nothing happens.
AcceptChatSessionTransfer: Accept the transfer: assign the session to the user. If the session is not being transferred, nothing happens.
RejectChatSessionTransfer: Do not want. Deny the transfer to the user. If the session is not being transferred, nothing happens.
PickUpChatSession: 'answer' the session: assign the session to the user. The welcome message is sent to the customer. Returns NULL if session was not in queue.
ResetChatSession: Reset chat session, put it back on the queue for pickup. Used by bots to hand off a session to human
GetChatTranscript: Get the chat transcript, formatted as plain text or html
GetChatMessages: Get all or some of the messages in a chat session

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatMessage.description:
A message in a chat session
<para />
Carrier object for ChatMessage.
Services for the ChatMessage Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

ChatSessionId.description: The reference to the associated chat session.

ReadByCustomer.description: Whether the message has been read by the customer or not.

SpecialType.description: Enum indicating if it is a special message, such as an URL redirection, etc.

WhenPosted.description: When the message was posted (UTC timestamp).

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ChatCarri.description: AddChatMessage: Add a new message to a chat session

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatTopicAgent.description:
User agents within a chat topic. Which users are assigned and what roles they have within the chat topic.
<para />
Carrier object for ChatTopicAgent.
Services for the ChatTopicAgent Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

TopicId.description: The reference to the associated chat topic.

User.description: The associate that is the user agent.

CanListen.description: True of a user can listen in on this topic

CanRespond.description: True if the user can respond to chats in this topic

CanManage.description: True if the user is a manager for this topic

CanNotify.description: True if the user should receive notifications for this topic

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatTopicEntity.description:
Chat topics define who is assigned, when the channel is open for business, and look of the chat widget.
<para />
Carrier object for ChatTopicEntity.
Services for the ChatTopicEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

Name.description: The name of this chat topic

WelcomeMessage.description: The welcome message sent to the customer when the chat session starts.

Language.description: Customer language used in this topic. Optional.

LastAccept.description: The last time a session was accepted from the inside for this topic.

SecondsPrAccept.description: The average number of seconds per accept for this topic.

AlertRecipient.description: The recipient(s) for the alert template

CollectConsent.description: Collect consent to store from user

BadgeHeader.description: The badge header of the chat topic

CustomQueueTextEnabled.description: Use the custom queue message text

CustomQueueText.description: A text to be used in the queue message in the chat widget. Usage is controlled by the flags field, bit number 3

WarnNewChatMinutes.description: Contains the user notify time in minutes

WarnManagerNewChatMinutes.description: Contains the manager notify time in minutes

TicketEnabled.description: Enable ticket submission in offline mode

TicketCategory.description: Category on ticket created from off-line request

TicketPriority.description: Priority on ticket created from off-line request

OpeningHoursEnabled.description: Whether to use opening hours or not.

BotEnabled.description: Enable chatbot on this topic. Run the trigger scripts on bot events.

BotSettings.description: Settings for chatbot: trigger script ids to run on bot events

OfflineCollectConsent.description: Collect offline consent to store from user

WarnChatMessageMinutes.description: Contains the user notify time in minutes for new chat messages

WarnManagerChatMessageMinutes.description: Contains the manager notify time in minutes for new chat messages

UseQueueOfflineForm.description: Use offline form capability from chat queue

OfflineFormTimeLimit.description: The number of minutes in the queue before the offline form is available

OfflineFormQueueLength.description: The number of customers in the queue before the offline form is available

WidgetEnableRating.description: Enable rating functionality in the chat widgte

WidgetRatingText.description: The text to be displayed in the widget next to the rating stars

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CustomerLanguag.description:
Customer languages that customer center supports.
<para />
Carrier object for CustomerLanguage.
Services for the CustomerLanguage Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ReplyTemplate.description:
Reply template item
<para />
Carrier object for ReplyTemplate.
Services for the ReplyTemplate Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Name.description: The name for this reply template.

Description.description: The description for this reply template.

FolderId.description: The id of the folder in which this reply template is located. NULL or -1 if this is a toplevel reply template.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketCategory.description:
Ticket Category - light read-only version of TicketCategoryEntity.
<para />
Carrier object for TicketCategory.
Services for the TicketCategory Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketPriority.description:
Carrier object for TicketPriority.
Services for the TicketPriority Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatOpeningHour.description:
Chat Topic Opening Hours
<para />
Carrier object for ChatOpeningHours.
Services for the ChatOpeningHours Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

TzLocation.description: Timezone used for the opening hours (start/stop times) for this topic.

MonStart.description: When opening hours start on Mondays. Only time-part is used.

MonStop.description: When opening hours stop on Mondays. Only time-part is used.

TueStart.description: When opening hours start on Tuesdays. Only time-part is used.

TueStop.description: When opening hours stop on Tuesdays. Only time-part is used.

WedStart.description: When opening hours start on Wednesdays. Only time-part is used.

WedStop.description: When opening hours stop on Wednesday. Only time-part is used.

ThuStart.description: When opening hours start on Thursdays. Only time-part is used.

ThuStop.description: When opening hours stop on Thursdays. Only time-part is used.

FriStart.description: When opening hours start on Fridays. Only time-part is used.

FriStop.description: When opening hours stop on Fridays. Only time-part is used.

SatStart.description: When opening hours start on Saturdays. Only time-part is used.

SatStop.description: When opening hours stop on Saturdays. Only time-part is used.

SunStart.description: When opening hours start on Sundays. Only time-part is used.

SunStop.description: When opening hours stop on Sundays. Only time-part is used.

UseLunchHours.description: Whether to use lunch hours or not.

LunchStart.description: When opening hours starts for lunch. Only time-part is used.

LunchStop.description: When opening hours stops for lunch. Only time-part is used.

Name.description: Name associated with the location: Country name + region name, Norway, United States - Alaska

TZLocationCode.description:
Code associated with location: UTC, AR-NQ, AU-QLD, PF2A
Not the an ISO country code. Unique.

TZLocationCities.description: Cities associated with location: Oslo, London, Rio de Janeiro

IsoNumber.description: Country ISO code associated with location: 578

TimeZoneDSTRules.description: Dictionary of Daylight saving time rules

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatWidgetSetti.description:
Defines the look of the chat widget.
<para />
Carrier object for ChatWidgetSettings.
Services for the ChatWidgetSettings Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

PreFormEnabled.description: Enable pre-chat form for anonymous users

PreFormMessage.description: Message to be shown in a pre-chat

RequiredFields.description: Fields required to start a chat

PostFormHeader.description: Header text to show in post chat form

PostFormMessage.description: Message text to show in post chat form

LanguageIsoCode.description: The language ISO code for the widget language

Size.description: Chat widget size: normal or large.

Theme.description: Predefined themes for the chat widget

Color.description: The base color of the widget

BadgeColor.description: Optional color for chat widget badge

BadgeTextColor.description: Optional color for chat widget badge text

CustMsgColor.description: Optional color for chat widget customer message

CustMsgTextColor.description: Optional color for chat widget customer message text

AgentMsgColor.description: Optional color for chat widget agent message

AgentMsgTextColor.description: Optional color for chat widget agent message text

ButtonColor.description: Optional color for chat widget button

ButtonTextColor.description: Optional color for chat widget button text

Font.description: The font used in the widget

FontSize.description: Optional size for chat widget font

LogoEnabled.description: Indicates if the logo should be shown in the widget

LogoBlobId.description: Blob id that contains logo image

ShowAgentPhoto.description: Use agent photo and name when chatting

WelcomeTitle.description: Short welcome message when user initiates a chat

WelcomeMessage.description: Short message displayed as long as the request is in queue or active

OfflineHeader.description: Offline text shown in widget header

OfflineFields.description: Required field when creating ticket in offline mode

UseAgentFirstname.description: Whether to use the firstname of the agent in the chat widget.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.KbCategory.description:
Knowledge base category. Groups knowledge base articles into hierarchy.
<para />
Carrier object for KbCategory.
Services for the KbCategory Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Fullname.description: The full name of this category, i.e. Foo/bar/test.

ParentId.description: This entry contains a reference to the parent category. NULL or -1 if this is a toplevel category.

SortOrder.description: A strictly ascending number used for sorting categories when they are listed.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ChatBotSettings.description:
Chat Topic bot settings. Trigger script ids to run on bot events
<para />
Carrier object for ChatBotSettings.
Services for the ChatBotSettings Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IChatAgent">Chat Agent</see>.

BotRegisterScriptId.description: Script id to register/unregister chatbot. 0 if there is no bot

BotSessionCreatedScriptId.description: Script id to run on new session.

BotSessionChangedScriptId.description: Script id to run when session state changes.

BotMessageReceivedScriptId.description: Script id to run when new messages received from customer.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ChatCarri.description: IsWithinOpeningHours: Check if we are right now within the opening hours of the given topic. Will use timezones to calculate if configured.
GetUserAgentList: Get list of users that can be assigned to chat topics. Users with Chat-CALs from the MDO list 'chatuser'

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.MDOListItem.description:
Carrier object for MDOListItem.
Services for the MDOListItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMDOAgent">MDO Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: The deleted status of the ListItem

Type.description: The type of the ListItem. Custom field.

ChildItems.description: The child items of the MDOListItem

IconHint.description: The Icon hint of the ListItem. Custom field.

ColorBlock.description: The color indicator of the ListItem color block

ExtraInfo.description: Extra information added to the ListItem. Could be information such as sort order etc or other meta data. Custom field.

StyleHint.description: Style hint indicating, information such as background color etc. Custom field.

FullName.description: The name of the ListItem in its context

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.ChatCarri.description: GetChatTopicUserAgentList: Get list of users assigned to a chat topic
GetChatTopicUserAgent: Get a user assigned to a topic
AddChatTopicUserAgent: Add a user to a chat topic
UpdateChatTopicUserAgent: Update a user's role in a chat topic
UpdateChatTopicUserAgents: Update users roles in a chat topic
DeleteChatTopicUserAgent: Remove a user from a topic
CreateChatSessionForTopic: Create a new session on a chat topic

SuperOffice Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.

externalDocs.description: The SuperOffice DevNet Community has more documentation, examples, and discussion forums.
